input_text.Prompt:
Generate an exciting product description that includes the product title and features in one paragraph of 6-8 sentences.

Product title:
SPRINGROSE 90 x 132 Inch Commercial Grade Heavy Duty Black Polyester Rectangle Tablecloths (Pack of 10)

Product features:
-Polyester
-Dimensions: 90” x 132” rectangle
-Pack of 10
-Color: Black
-Machine washable
-Great For weddings, banquets, anniversary parties, receptions, etc.
input_text.Response A: Are you looking for a heavy-duty tablecloth that will last for years? Look no further than the SPRINGROSE 90 x 132-inch Commercial Grade Heavy Duty Black Polyester Rectangle Tablecloths. Made from durable polyester, these tablecloths are built to withstand the wear and tear of regular use. The black color is perfect for creating a sleek and sophisticated look, while the 90 x 132-inch rectangle dimensions provide ample coverage for most tables. And with a pack of 10, you'll have plenty of tablecloths to use for all your events. Whether you're hosting a wedding, banquet, anniversary party, or reception, these tablecloths will help create the perfect setting. Plus, they're machine washable for easy care. Don't settle for less than the best - choose the SPRINGROSE Commercial Grade Heavy Duty Black Polyester Rectangle Tablecloths for all your tablecovering needs.
input_text.Response B: This pack of 10 heavy-duty polyester tablecloths are perfect for weddings, banquets, anniversary parties, and more. They are black in color and measure 90 inches by 132 inches. They are machine washable.

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
